title: BTN
description: BTN is a high-energy, fun way for Upper Primary and Secondary students to learn about current issues and events in their world. Each program is built around major news stories of the week.
description2: ['Flood Update, Flood Recovery Kids, NATO History, Aussie Astronauts, Tassie Tiger Return and Dorothy Hill.', "Ukraine Refugees, Flood Clean-Up, Women's History Month, Humpback Comeback and Aussie Astronaut.", "International Tourism, Battery Recycling, Coping with COVID, Endangered Koalas and Shackleton's Endurance Expedition.", "Russia Sanctions, Ukrainian Australians (Rookie), Australian Antarctic, Marine Sounds, Clean Up Australia Day and Women's History Month: Edith Cowan.", "Russia Media Freedom, Coral Bleaching, Daylight Saving, Goldilocks Birds, Evonne Goolagong Cawley for Women's History Month", "Petrol Prices, Sydney Harbour Bridge Birthday, Aussie Astronauts, AFL Science and Nancy Bird Walton for Women's History Month.", 'COVID catch-up, Djokovic Drama, Tonga Volcano, Free The Flag and James Webb Telescope.', 'School Hours, Indigenous War Cry, Peanut Allergy Treatment, ISS Crash Plan and BTN Investigates: Why do we have names?', 'Ukraine Tension, Inland Floods, COVID Waste, Safer Internet Day 2022 and Frozen Iguanas.']

title: Father Brown
description: The charming Father Brown returns to solve more mysteries in the sleepy Cotswold village of Kembleford.
description2: ['After the body of Reginald Brody is discovered at the bottom of Helmsley Tower, Chief Inspector Valentine returns to Kembleford to investigate. Valentine enlists Father Brown to help his investigation.', 'Faced with the prospect of travelling in second class, Lady Felicia is delighted to run into opera legend Dame Bianca Norman who invites her and Mrs McCarthy away from the riff-raff into her private pullman carriage.', 'Sergeant Goodfellow turns to Father Brown when he witnesses Mallory frame an innocent man.']

title: Peppa Pig (Mandarin)
description: The adventures of a cheeky and slightly bossy little pig called Peppa, who lives with her mummy and daddy and little brother George. Sometimes these adventures involve a few tears but they always end happily. (Mandarin)
description2: ["Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too, which makes Daddy's shirt pink.", 'Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don\'t want to play any "baby" games.', 'PC Panda brings his twin daughters to playgroup Peggi and Pandora Panda. They love puzzles and to solve mysteries just like their dad. (Mandarin)', 'Daddy Pig struggles to run a race to raise money to fix the school roof, but finds it far easier when a wasp is chasing him.', "Granny Pig shows Peppa and George her chickens, whilst something has been eating Grandpa Pig's lettuces.", 'Peppa and her friends at playgroup go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony who is in hospital.', "Madame Gazelle brings lots of musical instruments into playgroup for the children - instruments that go 'shake', 'rattle' and 'bang'!", 'Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her friends on a train ride where they must tick off what they see on their activity sheets.', "Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, while Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa. The little boys don't want to play the same games as Peppa and Suzy, so they all play jumping up and down in muddle puddles.", 'Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper, until everyone helps him train to win it back.', "Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends. But the little children are sad when they can't find any eggs.", 'Peppa and George go on a boat trip with Grandpa Pig, but they must send Polly Parrot for help when their boat runs aground. Polly fetches Granny Pig and Grandad Dog, who rescues them in his boat.', 'Peppa and Suzy learn that grown-ups must work all day, and the children play at working in a shop at playgroup and find it very hard work.', "Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where they learn how to be real explorers!", 'Mummy Pig gives Granny and Grandpa Pig her old computer to work and play on.', "Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks,  so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.", "Peppa and George go with Mummy Pig to Miss Rabbit's Mummies Fire Engine Service.", "Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the children's rules.", 'Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.', "Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to the playgroup where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song'.", 'Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.', "Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.", 'Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Club - going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!', "Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the seaside where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there's too much snow!", "Peppa's family go to the museum's Moon Exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant.", 'Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister Mummy Rabbit, and the other adults, offer to fill in for Miss Rabbit at the ice cream stand, the supermarket, and everywhere else she works!', "Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it's Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.", "Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside help make the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.", "All of Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports centre in town.", 'Peppa tries to prove to Suzy Sheep that she is not a chatterbox, but staying quiet is harder than it sounds.', 'Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her Rescue Helicopter!', 'Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!', "It's Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Grandad Dog and Grandpa Pig, the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.", "Peppa's cousins come to visit, but baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.", "Mr Fox takes Freddy to Peppa's house for a bike ride with the other children, and they all try to guess what kind of things Mr Fox has in the back of his van!", "It is Talent Day at Peppa's playgroup, and Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.", "Grandpa Pig takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.", "Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing... because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper aeroplanes.", 'Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.', 'Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig, but Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.', 'Peppa tries to learn how to whistle, when she realises everyone but her can do it.', "It is Christmas and the children all visit Santa's Grotto to tell him what they would like for Christmas.", 'Peppa is worried when Santa brings everyone but her a present, but he soon returns to deliver her missing present in person.', "Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets.", "Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they'd thought.", "Peppa brings home a Teddy from Playgroup to look after, but she is worried that he won't have a very exciting time.", 'Peppa and her family go on holiday in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van turns into a little house for them to sleep in.']

title: Robot Wars: World Series Specials
description: The UK's greatest robot fighters battle it out with the best teams from across the world in the Robot Wars bulletproof arena.
description2: ["Reigning champions Eruption lead a team of some of the fiercest robots in the UK: Big Nipper, Concussion and Thor. Their opposition includes USA's Cathadh, Canada's Terror Turtle, Russia's Weber and Bash from The Netherlands.", 'Former champions Apollo, Sabretooth, Terrorhurtz and Gabriel 2 take on a true legend of Robot Wars, Diotoir. Making up the Rest of the World Team areTMWHK from the Netherlands, Cobra from Belgium and Rabid M8 from Portugal.']

title: Spirited
description: Highly-strung dentist Suzy Darling leaves her loveless marriage and moves to a dilapidated apartment with her kids only to discover she has to share it with Henry, a 1970s British punk rock legend who just happens to be dead.
description2: ['Steve throws a birthday party for Elvis while Henry and Suzy have an unexpected visitor.', "Henry's attempts to remedy the ghost situation hit a snag and Potter the cat must go to extraordinary lengths to help him put things right.", "Suzy and Henry's relationship reaches a new depth when they have to combine forces to deal with an unwanted house guest.", "Suzy finds herself the object of a new, powerful and charismatic ghost's attention but his designs on her prove more sinister than sexy when his shocking past is exposed.", "An older flesh and blood version of Henry Mallet turns up on Zac's doorstep, claiming that he never died. While Zac takes him at his word, Suzy and Henry somewhat confused, attempt to find the truth.", 'When Henry and Suzy meet in a dream a previously unspoken sexual tension is unleashed with unexpected results.', "Henry Mallet returns to the Elysian with a coterie of new ghosts whose fun and games wreak havoc on Suzy's personal and professional life.", "Suzy is besieged by Nerve fans who have followed the cyber trail to the penthouse, while Henry recovers his memory only to find there is a lot he'd rather forget.", "Henry's world crumbles, literally, when he and Suzy learn The Elysian must be demolished. They are forced to go to extreme lengths to save him from going down with it. (Final)", "While Zac is busy consulting on the biopic of Henry's life, Jonquil is inspired to host a 'healing ceremony' for the King's victims with unexpected results.", 'Dentist Suzy leaves her husband Steve and moves with her children into a penthouse, only to find she has to share her new home with Henry, who is no ordinary man.', 'Suzy is sick. So when a cab from the Other Side arrives at the penthouse, both Henry and Suzy begin to prepare for an unwelcome, imminent departure. (Final)', 'Suzy and Henry are inspired to try Internet dating to find a suitable candidate for Henry to possess, while Jonquil must cope with the return of her adored, long lost mother.', 'Henry accidentally possesses Zac and rediscovers the sensuous joys of a living, breathing body, including cheese, smoking, beer and, hopefully, sex.', "Ghosts are disappearing but Henry is unconcerned until they realise Rita's pretty new friend is getting a thrill from 'liberating' spirits.", "Suzy and Henry come to terms with their new 'living' arrangements as they try to learn everything about Henry's former life as a punk rock star.", 'Suzy has discovered she has more in common with her long lost mother than she could ever have imagined, which leads to an astonishing revelation for Suzy and Henry.', "Henry tries to make contact with his fans while Steve's attempts to get back at Suzy through their children backfire badly and push her further towards independence - and Henry."]

title: The Mindfulness Tool Kit
description: In this series, we take a good look at the parts of the brain that relate to mindfulness and practice mindful techniques that help us to feel happier, reflective and more productive. Stage 3 PDHPE
description2: ["What is Empathy and how can we use our brains to practice it? It's called 'Prefrontal Power!' and it helps us to see life from someone else's perspective.", 'Take a moment to appreciate nature all around you.', 'Learn how to enjoy the things you find difficult.', "Let's talk about Mood! Sometimes we feel up and sometimes we feel down. Did you know that recalling a happy memory can make you feel better straight away? Find out how the chemicals in our brains work to make this happen.", 'Feeling a bit down? Follow this simple technique to make your brain feel happier.', 'In this episode, we find out how the brain works when we are angry or anxious and how we can re-wire it to relax, reflect and make more mindful choices.', "It's free and easy and it's a way to not only make yourself feel good, but the world around you too.", "If you feel disappointed because you can't get all the things you want, we've found a way to clear your mind and lift your spirits.", 'Think about the people who love you the most.', "Being kind is free and easy but it's funny how often we forget to show kindness. In this episode, we learn why helping someone else also makes our own selves feel really good.", "Life can be complicated when we think about all the things we don't have. Here's a way to reset your brain: say thank you for all the wonderful things you already have and feel yourself becoming more motivated and optimistic.", "Find the strength to be kind to yourself when you're feeling challenged.", 'In this mindfulness practice, we learn how to lead our minds back to the present moment.', 'What happens when we take a moment to let our mind settle?', 'Find out how to use empathy and feel more connected to your friends and family.']
